name: 9 dot 9
description: 9.9 group understand this India. We know what drives her, we know how she does business, we know the rules that govern her and we know what it takes to succeed. In 9.9 Media, you will find a partner with the capacity and capability to help you navigate this complex nation and chart a course to your success. 9.9 Media is an innovative content-driven company, using contemporary media to empower you to change your world. 9.9 goup believe that success is driven by people that motivate, knowledge that empowers and learning that inspires growth.
features: We ensure that every interaction that our customers, partners and vendors have with us enhances their respect for us
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Online and in-person engagement…  Relevant and insightful perspectives… Client and marketing impact…
ShortDescription: 9.9 Media is an innovative content-driven company, using contemporary media to empower you to change your world.

Highlights.name: People
Highlights.description: We bring together a talented pool of people with a diverse range of skills and interests, united by their passion to excel.

Highlights.name: Knowledge
Highlights.description: Combined with our expertise in delivering impactful solutions, we develop and deliver/disseminate content that is relevant, thought provoking and a catalyst for your success.

Highlights.name: Evolve/Evolution
Highlights.description: We strive to create learning opportunities that expand your horizons and inspire you to be the best that you can be. We provide the platform for peers to forge partnerships, acquire skills, exchange ideas and grow.

enhanced_description: 9 dot 9, offered by 9.9 Media, is an HR technology solution designed with a deep understanding of the Indian market dynamics. It provides comprehensive capabilities across core HR functions including Talent Management, HRMS/HCM, and Total Rewards. Specific functionalities cover Human Resource Information Systems (HRIS), career management, and employee recognition software. The platform aims to empower individuals through knowledge and learning, offering opportunities for skill acquisition, idea exchange, and personal growth, reflecting the company's philosophy of fostering success through people, knowledge, and evolution.
key_use_cases: Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
Reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees
Managing career development paths for employees
Providing learning opportunities for skill acquisition and growth
